document_data.name: Donnia Soldou
document_data.mainbody: '''Donnia Soldou''' was a [[drow]] [[assassin]] and a member of a band of four, including [[Ad'non Kareese]], [[Kaer'lic Suun Wett]] and [[Tos'un Armgo]].
document_data.Description: Donnia had long silver hair which she wore across the right half of her face covering her right eye. She dressed in clothes of deep gray and black, and had a cowl.
document_data.Relationships: Donnia was the lover of Ad'non.

History.Death: In [[1370 DR]], Donnia was killed by [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] while trying to escape from him by levitating down a precipice; Drizzt shot her with her own [[hand crossbow]], paralyzing her until the levitation spell wore off and she plummeted to her death.
